Functions
CreateCamera
CAUSTICAPI void CreateCamera(
bool leftHanded,
ICamera **ppCamera
)

! \brief CreateCamera returns a new ICamera object !  ! This method creates a new camera object. This camera can then ! be passed to IRenderer to be used for rendering.  ! \param[in] leftHanded Defines whether we have a left or right handed coordinate system ! \param[out] ppCamera Returns the newly created camera object !
